Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease a 9x13 inch baking dish lightly.

Arrange the chicken in the greased baking dish and sprinkle with 1/2 cup of brown sugar. Top with peach slices and then sprinkle the remaining 1/2 cup brown sugar, ginger, cloves, and lemon juice over the chicken.
Bake for around 30 minutes in the oven that has been preheated, brushing frequently with juices, until chicken is fully cooked and the juices run clear.
